name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE 9.  [OLD]
SECURED TRANSACTIONS; SALES OF ACCOUNTS,
CONTRACT RIGHTS AND CHATTEL PAPER

 § to 490:9-507  REPEALED.  L 2000, c 241, §30.
 
ARTICLE 9.
SECURED TRANSACTIONS

PART 1.  GENERAL PROVISIONS
Subpart 1.  Short Title, Definitions, and General Concepts
     This article may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code -- Secured Transactions. [L 2000, c 241, pt of §1]
